issue.title: [Snyk] Upgrade vizion from 2.0.2 to 2.1.1

repository.name: pm2
repository.description: Node.js Production Process Manager with a built-in Load Balancer.

issue.body:
Snyk has created this PR to upgrade vizion from 2.0.2 to 2.1.1.

:information_source: Keep your dependencies up-to-date. This makes it easier to fix existing vulnerabilities and to more quickly identify and fix newly disclosed vulnerabilities when they affect your project.
- The recommended version is **2 versions** ahead of your current version. - The recommended version was released **2 days ago**, on 2020-04-12.
Release notes
Package name: vizion
  • 2.1.1 - 2020-04-12
  • 2.1.0 - 2020-04-12
  • 2.0.2 - 2018-07-20

    chore: update package version to 2.0.2

from vizion GitHub release notes
Commit messages
Package name: vizion
  • 38e7752 CHANGELOG
  • c78bb51 @2.1.1 - bump lodash
  • 62c5101 2.1.0
  • 1df3780 Merge pull request #27 from 418sec/master
  • 0f13af5 Merge pull request #24 from taktran/patch-1
  • dd981d8 Merge pull request #23 from keithws/fix-svn-metadata
  • 3f2bf9b Merge pull request #1 from RadoiAndrei/master
  • ded18ca Improved condition for readability
  • 7a94c4f Refactored the refactor
  • 17780c0 Refactored
  • 15d7bbe Fixed command injection through the revertTo revision string
  • 4412f30 Fix typo in readme
  • d3ac17c fallback to parse update_time from svn log
  • ba6647c fixed bugs in svn.parse function
Compare

issue.body:

#### Changes included in this PR - Changes to the following files to upgrade the vulnerable dependencies to a fixed version: - package.json #### Vulnerabilities that will be fixed ##### With an upgrade: Severity | Issue | Breaking Change | Exploit Maturity :-------------------------:|:-------------------------|:-------------------------|:------------------------- ![high severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/h.png "high severity") | Command Injection

Package name: vizion The new version differs by 47 commits.
  • 62c5101 2.1.0
  • 1df3780 Merge pull request #27 from 418sec/master
  • 0f13af5 Merge pull request #24 from taktran/patch-1
  • dd981d8 Merge pull request #23 from keithws/fix-svn-metadata
  • 3f2bf9b Merge pull request #1 from RadoiAndrei/master
  • ded18ca Improved condition for readability
  • 7a94c4f Refactored the refactor
  • 17780c0 Refactored

  • d4a7045 Only load needed methods from async into memory.
  • c7d3304 Updates packages.
  • 00c9c93 chore: update package version to 2.0.1
  • bcbaeba hotfix: return callback in case commit is null

issue.title: [Snyk] Fix for 4 vulnerabilities

repository.name: pm2
repository.description: Production process manager for Node.js apps with a built-in load balancer

issue.body:
Snyk has created this PR to fix one or more vulnerable packages in the `npm` dependencies of this project.

#### Changes included in this PR - Changes to the following files to upgrade the vulnerable dependencies to a fixed version: - package.json #### Vulnerabilities that will be fixed ##### With an upgrade: Severity | Priority Score (*) | Issue | Breaking Change | Exploit Maturity :-------------------------:|-------------------------|:-------------------------|:-------------------------|:------------------------- ![medium severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/m.png "medium severity") | **586/1000**
**Why?** Proof of Concept exploit, Has a fix available, CVSS 5.3 | Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS)
[SNYK-JS-GLOBPARENT-1016905](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-GLOBPARENT-1016905) | Yes | Proof of Concept ![medium severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/m.png "medium severity") | **601/1000**
**Why?** Proof of Concept exploit, Has a fix available, CVSS 5.6 | Prototype Pollution
[SNYK-JS-MINIMIST-559764](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-MINIMIST-559764) | No | Proof of Concept ![high severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/h.png "high severity") | **748/1000**
**Why?** Proof of Concept exploit, Recently disclosed, Has a fix available, CVSS 7.1 | Improper Privilege Management
[SNYK-JS-SHELLJS-2332187](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-SHELLJS-2332187) | No | Proof of Concept ![high severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/h.png "high severity") | **681/1000**
**Why?** Proof of Concept exploit, Has a fix available, CVSS 7.2 | Command Injection
[SNYK-JS-VIZION-565230](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-VIZION-565230) | Yes | Proof of Concept (*) Note that the real score may have changed since the PR was raised.

  • db99076 fix(Windows): Add converting from windows to unix path for all ignored paths. (#824)
  • 41f8782 fix(FsEvents): Remove situation with NaN depth. (#823)
  • 7cf3f7e Update readdirp to stable.
  • 0927a62 Bump packages.
  • 11cd857 Update nyc.
  • 99c14d7 Uncomment fsevents.
  • cf330a5 Update fsevents.
  • 0e4fca5 Fix deps.
  • 9c575d4 Fix Windows version (#821)
  • 3323d59 fix(Linux): Make event loop hack for keep testing valid. (#820)
  • 06214c5 Update to latest readdirp.
  • 793639f Rename osxfswatch.
  • 078bc2d Refactor and fix freaking tests.
  • 2b9bb41 Try node 11.
  • 3fe3d4e Test travis.

issue.title: [Snyk] Security upgrade vizion from 0.2.13 to 2.1.0

repository.name: pm2
repository.description: General Purpose Process Manager and Node.js Production Runtime with a built-in Load Balancer.

issue.body:
This PR was automatically created by Snyk using the credentials of a real user.


Snyk has created this PR to fix one or more vulnerable packages in the `npm` dependencies of this project.

![merge advice](https://app.snyk.io/badges/merge-advice/?package_manager=npm&package_name=vizion&from_version=0.2.13&to_version=2.1.0&pr_id=01c9cc23-7003-4b6a-849e-fc202a29acdd&visibility=true&has_feature_flag=false) #### Changes included in this PR - Changes to the following files to upgrade the vulnerable dependencies to a fixed version: - package.json #### Vulnerabilities that will be fixed ##### With an upgrade: Severity | Priority Score (*) | Issue | Breaking Change | Exploit Maturity :-------------------------:|-------------------------|:-------------------------|:-------------------------|:------------------------- ![high severity](https://res.cloudinary.com/snyk/image/upload/w_20,h_20/v1561977819/icon/h.png "high severity") | **768/1000**
**Why?** Proof of Concept exploit, Recently disclosed, Has a fix available, CVSS 7.5 | Prototype Pollution
[SNYK-JS-ASYNC-2441827](https://snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-ASYNC-2441827) | Yes | Proof of Concept (*) Note that the real score may have changed since the PR was raised.
Commit messages
Package name: vizion The new version differs by 47 commits.
  • 62c5101 2.1.0
  • 1df3780 Merge pull request #27 from 418sec/master
  • 0f13af5 Merge pull request #24 from taktran/patch-1
  • dd981d8 Merge pull request #23 from keithws/fix-svn-metadata
  • 3f2bf9b Merge pull request #1 from RadoiAndrei/master
  • ded18ca Improved condition for readability
  • 7a94c4f Refactored the refactor
  • 17780c0 Refactored
  • 15d7bbe Fixed command injection through the revertTo revision string
  • 4412f30 Fix typo in readme
  • d3ac17c fallback to parse update_time from svn log
  • ba6647c fixed bugs in svn.parse function
  • 551bd45 chore: update package version to 2.0.2
  • f9150b5 Merge pull request #21 from medanat/master
  • 1e5fab5 Remove support for iojs, Node 0.10, 0.11, and 0.12. Adds support for Node 8, 9, 10.
  • 0519759 Upgrade shelljs to latest and casts `.pwd`'s output to a string.
  • 37894b4 Replaces deprecated istanbul with nyc.
  • 272e75d Move mocha opts to mocha.opts.
  • 9e2f49b Use `callsFake` as the previous stub signature is no longer valid.
  • 36d3f38 Updates sinon to latest.
  • d4a7045 Only load needed methods from async into memory.
  • c7d3304 Updates packages.
  • 00c9c93 chore: update package version to 2.0.1
  • bcbaeba hotfix: return callback in case commit is null
See the full diff

repository.description: Node.js Production Process Manager with a built-in Load Balancer.

issue.body:
This PR was automatically created by Snyk using the credentials of a real user.


Snyk has created this PR to fix one or more vulnerable packages in the `npm` dependencies of this project.

issue.title: pm2 god daemon crash. malloc(): unaligned tcache chunk detected

repository.name: pm2
repository.description: Node.js Production Process Manager with a built-in Load Balancer.

issue.body:
## What's going wrong?
pm2 got daemon crashes on a couple of our Ubuntu 22.04 servers

## How could we reproduce this issue?
I can't reproduce at will it will happen once every day or 2.

## Supporting information

<!--
Please run the following command (available on PM2 >= 2.6)
-->
